projectPurpose: To provide Granblue Fantasy: Relink players with a real-time damage meter and combat statistics overlay to help analyze and improve their in-game performance.
mainFeatures: Track damage statistics in Granblue Fantasy: Relink
Provides an in-game overlay for displaying DPS and other metrics
Easy installation via MSI installer
Overlay clickthrough toggle
Parses combat data by injecting into the game process

alternatives.name: Advanced Combat Tracker (ACT)
mainFeatures: General-purpose combat parser
Supports multiple games via plugins (e.g., FFXIV, EverQuest)
Tracks damage, healing, and other combat events
Extensive plugin ecosystem for overlays and features
Configuration required for specific games and overlays

alternatives.name: IINACT
mainFeatures: Open-source ACT alternative for FFXIV
Cross-platform support
Modern framework for potentially better performance
Integrates as a Dalamud plugin for FFXIV
Easier installation/configuration than ACT

alternatives.name: Scuffed GBFR Parser
mainFeatures: Damage meter specifically for Granblue Fantasy: Relink
Reads game memory for damage calculation
Python-based, can be run from source
Mentioned on Nexus Mods and Reddit as a GBFR parser
May require more technical setup than an installer

alternatives.name: FPS Monitor
mainFeatures: General game performance overlay
Monitors FPS, CPU/GPU usage, temperatures, etc.
Real-time hardware information display
Customizable overlay appearance
Hardware alerts

alternatives.name: Intel PresentMon
mainFeatures: Game performance overlay and telemetry
Monitors FPS, frame time, and GPU busy
Supports multi-vendor hardware
Configurable overlay with real-time graphs
Supports various graphics APIs (DX9, 10, 11, 12, OpenGL, Vulkan)

marketPositioning: GBFR Logs is positioned as a highly specialized and user-friendly damage meter specifically for Granblue Fantasy: Relink. Unlike general-purpose combat parsers that require game-specific plugins and extensive configuration, GBFR Logs offers a direct, easy-to-install solution with a built-in overlay tailored for the game. Its focus on a single game simplifies the user experience, differentiating it from more complex alternatives and providing a dedicated tool for the GBFR: Relink community seeking to analyze their combat performance.
